pkgmetadata.longdescription: ``` ___ _ _ _____ _ _ ___ ___ / _ \ _ __ | |_(_)_ __ ___ |_ _|__ ___ | | / | / _ \ / _ \| | | | '_ \| __| | '_ ` _ \ | |/ _ \ / _ \| | | || | | | | | || |_| | | | | |_| | | | | | | | | (_) | (_) | | | || |_| | |_| | \___/|_| |_|\__|_|_| |_| |_| |_|\___/ \___/|_| |_(_)___(_)___/usage: otdev-tool [-h] [-l] [-p PROJECT] [-f FUNCTION]options: -h, --help show this help message and exit -l, --list List all functions supported. -p PROJECT, --project PROJECT Set project, default is sunfire. -f FUNCTION, --function FUNCTION Set function you'd like to call.```
